label: Visual Studio Community 2013 MDA on Windows Server 2012 R2
displayName: Visual Studio Community 2013 with Tools for Apache Cordova CTP 3.1 on Windows Server 2012 R2
description: This image contains Windows Server 2012 R2, Visual Studio Community 2013, and CTP 3.1 of the Tools for Apache Cordova. It allows you to easily and quickly set up a development environment in Azure to build and test Android, iOS, and Windows apps using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Please see [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=397716|http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=397716] for more information.
